DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine role prophylactic therapy tamsulosin prior extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy avoid development steinstrasse . 150 person go Extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy randomize 2 group . Group 1 -of 75 person recieve tamsulosin 0.4 mg x 1/d 2 day lithotripsy . Group 2 - 75 person recieve tamsulosin . 48 hour ESWL 2 group take abdominal radiograph evaluate presence steinstrasse .
DOC.brief_title: Is There Role Prophylactic Therapy With Tamsulosin Before Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy Avoid Development Steinstrasse ?
DOC.criteria: size stone 12 cm ureteral stricture Presence internal stent prior use alfa bloker prior ESWL
DOC.keyword: Pt . use alfa bloker prior ESWL
